Our 2023 paper on biomedical NLP has been recently chosen as one… move, this recognition shows the lasting resonance of our work.

![](images/imia-award.png){fig-alt="Excerpt from IMIA Yearbook 2024 showing our paper" fig-align="center"}

Our suite of specialised models headlined by *CompactBioBERT*, has passed 2 million downloads in just 18 months (over 170 K this month alone). For the full model suite:  
– [CompactBioBERT](https://huggingface.co/nlpie/compact-biobert)  
– [NLPIE on Hugging Face](https://huggingface.co/nlpie)

This award appears in IMIA’s Yearbook (2024 Edition), which compiles the most influential contributions to global medical informatics.

Thanks to my co‐authors Mohammadmahdi Nouriborji, Samaneh Kouchaki, and David Clifton for their partnership on this work.
